resources.string:
Peruvian gastronomy is considered one of the best in the world. 

Each region of Peru (coast, mountains and jungle) has a great variety of ingredients and flavors. 

What makes Peruvian cuisine the most privileged and unique in the world.
How many dishes are there in Peru?

Peruvian gastronomy is one of the most complex and with more typical dishes. 

In the book "357 lists to understand how Peruvians are" they have up to 491 typical dishes. 

More than 2,500 different types of soups have been registered along the entire Peruvian coast and more than 250 typical desserts.
